name: Operation Carrotfield
description:
A submission for Ludum Dare 52

Grab all the carrots from the farmer's field by placing your rabbits and hitting Charge!

The farmer will set up traps once he realizes the threat - use stronger rabbits to break these!

Defuse bombs with specialist rabbits, and get bonus carrots if you steal over 75% of the carrots in a round!

Be careful not to lose any of your rabbits, as this will incur a carrot penalty!
